title: Race for a Vaccine
description: As COVID-19 cases surge across the country, Lester Holt takes a comprehensive look at the latest plans to get a vaccine into the hands of Americans. Originally aired on NBC on December 3, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
